tool_input.command:
set -euo pipefail; mkdir -p ~/.config; 
# Backup existing ~/.claude
if [ -e "$HOME/.claude" ]; then
  if [ -e "$HOME/.claude.bak" ]; then
    mv "$HOME/.claude" "$HOME/.claude.bak.$(date +%s)"
    echo "Moved existing ~/.claude to ~/.claude.bak.$(date +%s)"
  else
    mv "$HOME/.claude" "$HOME/.claude.bak"
    echo "Moved existing ~/.claude to ~/.claude.bak"
  fi
fi
# Create symlink for claude
ln -sfn "$HOME/Development/Build/opencode-config/config/claude" "$HOME/.claude"
# Backup existing ~/.config/opencode
if [ -e "$HOME/.config/opencode" ]; then
  if [ -e "$HOME/.config/opencode.bak" ]; then
    mv "$HOME/.config/opencode" "$HOME/.config/opencode.bak.$(date +%s)"
    echo "Moved existing ~/.config/opencode to ~/.config/opencode.bak.$(date +%s)"
  else
    mv "$HOME/.config/opencode" "$HOME/.config/opencode.bak"
    echo "Moved existing ~/.config/opencode to ~/.config/opencode.bak"
  fi
fi
# Create symlink for opencode
ln -sfn "$HOME/Development/Build/opencode-config/config/opencode" "$HOME/.config/opencode"
# Verification outputs
echo '--- readlink targets ---'
readlink -f ~/.claude || true
readlink -f ~/.config/opencode || true
echo '--- ls ~/.claude/agents.yaml ---'
ls -la ~/.claude/agents.yaml || true
echo '--- ls ~/.config/opencode/agents.json ---'
ls -la ~/.config/opencode/agents.json || true
tool_input.description: Backup existing dirs if present, create symlinks to repo config, and verify targets
